name: 近體詩／現代詩創作與英譯
description:
1.	簡介文化差異與文學翻譯理論及技巧之應用
2.	講授近體詩結構，格律與傳統。選讀代表詩人作品
3.	評論台灣現代詩面貌與特式。作品選讀
4.	嘗試近體詩/現代詩創作及英譯
This course attempts to view traditional and modern Chinese poetry in a cultural model informed but not dominated by contemporary Western or Continental theories. Students will be asked to ponder the following questions: Can poetry be translated? What are the criteria for good poetry? What is poetry in Chinese now? Lectures will cover such broad topics as translation theories; prosody, structure, and convention of regulated verse; aesthetics of traditional and modern Chinese verses; democratic features of modern poetry from Taiwan; etc. We will analyze, enjoy, critique, and translate samples of both traditional and modern Chinese poetry. I will also ask and help each one of you to produce your own proud samples.
goals: 肯定傳統文化用途與價值
提升對現代詩的認同與接受
培養對英譯古典／現代詩之興趣
增加對翻譯技巧的了解
透過練習提升英文表達能力
syllabus:
按主題分立單元授課，輔以練習、示範及朗讀時段。

Week       上課內容

1              課程簡介 preamble

2-3           翻譯技巧分類 translation techniques

4-5           翻譯理論及應用 translation theories

6-7           近體詩格律 regulated Chinese verse: prosody and structure

8-9           音韻與方言 rhymes and dialects

10-11       近體詩創作技巧 producing regulated Chinese verse

12-13       認識新詩 what is modern Chinese poetry?

14-15       近體詩/新詩創作 writing poetry in Chinese

16-17       英譯方法 translating Chinese poetry into English: mission(im)possible

18            譯詩得失 poetry translation: gainvs. loss

grading.note: 因所有文本閱讀、翻譯、創作、朗讀技巧均在課堂傳授，期末評量時除作業外亦會計入出席狀態及課堂表現。
